Sequence Information.Peptide Name: L26-19 (Synthetic AMPs, PG-1 derived, UCBB1ad, Lys-rich)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (92.86%) toCyclic L27-11R=W=P: 14%, K: 36%, P=L: 14%.Activity: Active against P. aeruginosa ATCC 27853 or PAO1 (MIC 0.02-0.03 ug/ml), A-baumannii DSM3008  (MIC>64 ug/ml), K-pneumoniae ATCC 13883 (MIC>64 ug/ml), S-maltophilia ATCC 13637 (MIC>64 ug/ml),  E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 32 ug/ml), E-faecalis DSM 12956 (MIC>64 ug/ml), and S. aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC 64 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Srinivas N, Jetter P, Ueberbacher BJ, Werneburg M, Zerbe K, Steinmann J, Van der Meijden B, Bernardini F, Lederer A, Dias RL, Misson PE, Henze H, Zumbrunn J, Gombert FO, Obrecht D, Hunziker P, Schauer S, Ziegler U, KÃ¤ch A, Eberl L, Riedel K, DeMarco SJ, Robinson JA. 2010
Literature Information.Title: Peptidomimetic antibiotics target outer-membrane biogenesis in Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
